page.title: 07Employment.
page.content: Maristow Estate is the main source of employment, on its farms and within the Lopes' households.On the farming side there are 3 herdsman,a relief herdsman,a student from agricultural college, 3 tractor drivers, the farm manager and his secretary. the farm manager plans the programme, submits it to the landowner for approval, oversees the home farm and the remainder of the farming on the estate. Tenant farmers can pass the farm onto the next generation providing he has a son who wishes to carry on. The employees of the Moorland Links Hotel generally live in accomodation adjacent to the hotel. Others living in the area may travel to Plymouth or Tavistock for employment. A tiny minority are self employed.
